solution_line_template: Soccer Stars won and lost a total of {games_won}+{games_lost} = <<{games_won}+{games_lost}={won_and_lost}>>{won_and_lost} games.
The total points from the wins are {games_won}*{points_per_win} = <<{games_won}*{points_per_win}={points_from_wins}>>{points_from_wins} points.
The total points from draws are {games_drawn}*{points_per_draw} = <<{games_drawn}*{points_per_draw}={points_from_draws}>>{points_from_draws} points.
The total points from the losses are {games_lost} * {points_per_loss} = <<{games_lost}*{points_per_loss}={points_from_losses}>>{points_from_losses} points.
They had {points_from_wins}+{points_from_draws}+{points_from_losses} = <<{points_from_wins}+{points_from_draws}+{points_from_losses}={total_points}>>{total_points} points when the season ended.
